description: Institutional Research Repository (IRR) is a digital repository of SIT's research outputs. It collects, describes, stores, preserves and provides access to the outputs of SIT's research activities, to allow the University's research outputs to be tracked and made visible to different stakeholders.
name: Singapore Institute of Technology data

description: SMU Research Data Repository (SMU RDR) is a tool and service for all researchers to store, share and publish their research data. SMU RDR accepts a wide range of research data and outputs generated from research projects.
name: SMU Research Data Repository (RDR)

description: Discover USDA-funded research in Ag Data Commons
name: Ag Data Commons
